name: Defenders of Elvane
description:
Welcome to Defenders of Elvane

Defenders of Elvane is a fast paced shooter located in space you play as a ship struggling to defend your mother ship against the aliens you encounter.

You will need to constantly be adapting and upgrading your ship to fight the endless hordes of enemies attempting to destroy the mother ship. 

Upgrade, fight, win.

Get your highest score and post it below to challenge everyone!
